Implement a global education system: As the ruler of the world, I would prioritize education and knowledge-sharing across all countries. I would establish a standardized global education system that would provide equal opportunities for everyone, regardless of their location or socio-economic background. This would empower individuals to make informed decisions, foster innovation, and promote peace and understanding.

Create a sustainable food system: I would focus on creating a sustainable and equitable food system that ensures everyone has access to nutritious food. I would invest in sustainable agriculture practices, such as organic farming, and promote the use of renewable energy sources to reduce food waste and greenhouse gas emissions.

Develop a universal healthcare system: I would prioritize the health and well-being of all individuals by implementing a universal healthcare system. This would provide access to quality healthcare services, regardless of a person's ability to pay. It would also encourage preventative care and promote health literacy to reduce healthcare costs and improve overall health outcomes.

Promote gender equality: As the ruler of the world, I would work towards promoting gender equality and empowering women and girls. This would involve investing in education, job training, and economic opportunities for women, as well as addressing gender-based violence and discrimination.

Foster international cooperation: I would prioritize international cooperation and diplomacy to promote peace and stability across the world. This would involve working with other countries to address global challenges such as climate change, nuclear proliferation, and terrorism, and promoting cultural exchange and understanding.
